file_content.text: [Sir Deris is in no condition to speak.]
You are not Ulgo. There's something you need to know.
Come close, I must ask a task of you, and the rivers swarm with Ulgo murderers.
Tell me, do you care for Alderaan? Or only for the house you serve?
Thul will win. I will see to that.
The Empire works with Thul.
Then I will hope even House Thul can find their way back to honor. I am Sir Deris Panteer of the Queensguard.
The true crown of Alderaan lies in this river, lost when Queen Panteer's transport was ambushed and destroyed.
I know who I am and what I stand for. Other alliances are for convenience.
I serve myself, first.
Then I must trust you as my only hope. I am Sir Deris Panteer of the Queensguard.
I help all who would bring this planet peace.
[Lie] I serve Alderaan.
Then we are brethren. I am Sir Deris of House Panteer's Queensguard. I failed my queen, and now Alderaan is leaderless.
Queen Panteer was killed when her transport crashed in this river. Her body was found, but her crown still lies in the water.
When this war ends, only House Panteer can pass on the crown and create the next legitimate ruler of Alderaan.
Much of this river must have been searched already.
Where do I start?
The queen wasn't wearing the crown when her transport was sunk. It's in a duralloy container.
But the Ulgos don't know it. Their armies are hunting for the crown in the wrong part of the river.
Crown or no crown, you're bleeding to death.
You need medical help.
My death is nothing. If the next ruler's succession is seen as tainted, millions more will die; there will be no peace.
Why should I help?
Every noble house wants House Panteer's blessing on their victory day. Alderaan needs a ruler.
Find the crown... evade the army. Take it to Captain Lieber of the Queensguard in the mountains. He can be trusted.
If this symbol will pacify the populace, it is wise to find it.
I could use such leverage.
I will enjoy seeing Panteer squirm when I offer them their jewel.
I will take it where I will.
Petty... but our hope lies with you.
I'll do this, but don't tell me I can't wear that fancy hat until I hand it over.
I'm not above a treasure hunt.
I will do this for your house.
We could use allies.
Then I can rest.
Your task will be accomplished. I swear it.
Rest easy. I will do it.
Such honor is rare. To die in its company... there is no finer exit.
This war will be won on the battlefield, not by dragging a river for a gilded hat.
No. [Refuse quest]
Such contempt. You may conquer this planet, but you will never understand it.
If you cannot save me, let me die.
No man of Alderaan would stand such an insult and still be called a man.
I see the Sith are practical when it suits them.
The moment... it is here. Search... the deep... and remember, Captain Lieber. No other.
[Sir Deris is in no condition to speak.]
